snippet: The scale of the problems, as well as the size of the expected repair bill — 25 billion euros, or $32 billion — may amplify public concerns about the safety of nuclear power.
abstract: European Commission reports that more than 130 active nuclear reactors in the European Union need safety improvements, repairs or upgrades, at a cost of up to $32 billion; scale of problems as well as cost of the repair bill may amplify public concerns about safety of nuclear power.
lead_paragraph: The scale of the problems, as well as the size of the expected repair bill — 25 billion euros, or $32 billion — may amplify public concerns about the safety of nuclear power.

headline.seo: Europe Nuclear Reactors Need Fixes, Report Says
headline.main: Europe’s Nuclear Reactors Need Repair or Upgrades
headline.print_headline: Safety Report Says Europe’s Nuclear Reactors Need Repair
